website_summaries.verdict: Though the fit and style aren't for everyone, those who like them are likely to enjoy comfort and longevity from these practical shoes.
pros: With rugged, waterproof leather and thick rubber soles, these shoes are ideal for walking in inclement weather and on various outdoor surfaces
A few owners have commented that they are as comfortable as slippers
cons: Depending on foot shape, they may be hard to put on or will possibly slip off quite easily
Design is on the bulky side and runs wide on most

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for winter Bomb cyclone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes at the News we were going to NYC during “Bomb Cyclone” winter storm. I’m almost 50 years old and did not want my shopping affected by cold wet feet. There were many snow piles I had to step on to cross the streets! At one point a water line broke, and I had to step in a water ice mixture! Not once did my get get wet, or even cold (I was wearing smart wool socks- which I equally recommend with the purchase of this shoe- they are a great paring!). These shoes made for a better than expected trip during a horrible snow storm!
customer_reviews.author: Julia L. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fit was too large
customer_reviews.text: Always love Keen for their fit and quality, BUT...these slip-ons were too big and I had to send them back. Would recommend an half size smaller unless your foot is especially wide. The barn red is a nice color and not too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Carol N

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: God I love these shoes. They are as comfortable as a slipper but with a sturdy outdoor sole. With the (thin) fleece lining they are perfect for cool to cold winter days with no snow, when you are running errands and shopping and don't need a winter boot. Can be worn comfortably indoors too. They do run large, I had to exchange for a half size smaller. The barn red is a nice deep berry, very versatile. I may order in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Blackcat50

customer_reviews.title: Heel slips off with every step
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Love the red leather! I got the Womens 10, my normal size. They appear to fit well, until I walk in them. Big problem is that the heel slips off with every step. I read about this problem in other reviews but decided to order them anyway. All of my shoes, boots, winter boots and even steel toe boots are Keen's, because historically they had what I needed: wide/tall toe box, narrow supportive heel, and really good arch support. This has been harder to find in recent years. I'll be sad to return these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MoonDeerSounding

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the color of this shoe - a welcome change from black or gray. The shoe fits well - however as with other Keen shoes I have purchased, the heel area is a little wide resulting in a loose fit. Remedied this with a heavier sock/or 2 light layered socks. Even with heavier socks, the shoe still fits comfortably. Haven't tried them out in winter weather yet. My only concern is that they do not "squeak" . Had that issue with another pair of Keens (different style) - so hoping that this pairdoesn't develop that annoying little noise - especially since these are an expensive pair of shoes! Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: LSWhite

customer_reviews.title: I bought my first pair of Keens last summer and my feet never felt better. I now have 4 pair and wonder why ...
customer_reviews.text: The Kaci Winter WP shoes are just what I was looking for. I bought my first pair of Keens last summer and my feet never felt better. I now have 4 pair and wonder why it took me so long to get on the Keen band wagon. I am more active now that my Achilles problem has lessened due to these shoes. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Guyette

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was hoping for...
customer_reviews.text: Ahh the joy of no break-in time! Just got these, on my feet all day. Many foot problems. These have Plenty of toe space...great support...Very soft and pliable. Light weight. And actually look good in a large size.
customer_reviews.author: Sora

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes after reading positive reviews. I wear a size 6-1/2 and ordered a 6-1/2 which fit perfectly. They arrived neatly boxed, wrapped in tissue and tissue inserts to maintain the shape. At first sight they reminded me of Dutch shoes. I wanted an outdoor shoe for the yard, but I’ve been wearing them indoors and on walks as well. They are very comfortable, sturdy and well made. The rubber bumper toe offers additional protection. Lots of toe space, but my feet are not wide. They offer stability and help with balance.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slip on walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is awesome. I am a big Keen fan, and currently own 11 pair (walking shoes, hiking boots, sandals). I need good walking shoes and my feet appreciate a wide toe box -- Keen never fails me on my requirements. One or another pair of my Keens are my "go to" shoes nearly 100% of the time. I was in the market for a slip on walking shoe and noticed these. I love them so much I may order a second pair of them to keep in reserve. BTW, the fit is completely as expected. I always order the same size and have never been disappointed by the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Debber

customer_reviews.title: Another home run for Keen!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least 10 pairs of Keen footwear - sandals, shoes, boots, clogs... I just love the way they fit. I normally wear a size 10, and find that I need to order a size 41 (Keen's 10.5) to achieve the proper fit. These shoes are typical of Keen - high quality, comfortable, rugged yet attractive. There is ample room in the toe box. I have a medium width foot with a somewhat narrow heel, so I do slip a bit in these, but they're great with my warm socks. Another win from Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes rock!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mom for Christmas because I have a pair, and I love them! Keep your feet nice & warm without getting too hot. I haven't spent hours outside in these, but what I use them for my feet stay warm. Plenty of toe room for those with wider feet. Very good soles to help with traction in the snow/ice. Highly recommend! The price on Amazon is cheaper than what I purchased my shoes for from a sporting good retailer.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had tried these on in a store and knew to order a half size smaller. Even then, they are roomy. Comfortable right out of the box, whether I am on my feet in the kitchen or walking or light hiking. Good for rainy days and I anticipate they'll be fine in the Maine snow as well. Good tread, water resistant, roomy enough for thick socks. Good arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking casual shoes and the fit was true to size. However, the exaggerated arch support hurt my feet and the top of the shoe where your foot goes in was too tight and uncomfortable, perhaps because I have a high instep. I wanted to keep the shoes, but they are too uncomfortable so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ladanye

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, narrower in heel?
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, warm shoe with good support. Wide toe box but prob a slightly narrower heel than some Keene shoes. its still a bit wide for me but fits ok. But if you love the way Keene hiking boots fit (wide all over), these may not feel the same. I can't wear the boots but love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Supportive, warm, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I now have 2 pairs....one for home and cabin. They are a little tight when u first put them on around the ankle. Don't despair. They loosen up and get easier to put on. They keep my feet warm, supported, don't slip off, easy to walk in. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keen's never disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Winter/waterproof slip on that was both warm and comfortable. I tried many other brands and was happy to find these in Keen's. I do not like my toes to be squished and love that Keen's have more room. I am so glad to find these. They were exactly as expected and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, warm, and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are as comfortable as all the reviews have stated. I bought them for a cold, rainy trip to Ireland. Time got away from me and I didn’t get a chance to break them in before going. I have a bad back and arthritis so I am very shoe sensitive. I was worried because of all the walking we would do. That was a wasted worry. They were not only comfortable right out of the box but they kept my feet warm & dry the entire trip. Two thumbs up from this lady!
customer_reviews.author: HappyJAX

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy winter shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Keen makes great shoes and this one is a good one. Has a wide toe box and it took me awhile to get used to it, esp. since I have a big foot! Very well made and will probably last and hold up for many years. A little clunky, but if I had a smaller foot, it would probably not seem that way. Would give it 41/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE SHOES ESPECIALLY THIS STYLE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE SHOES ESPECIALLY THIS STYLE, EXCEPT THEY ARE RUNNING WAY LARGER THEN THEY NORMALLY DO. I WEAR KEEN ON A REGULAR BASES AND KNOW MY SIZING.
customer_reviews.author: FloorsMD

customer_reviews.title: Great style but too tight with wool socks
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the reviews said they run big, but I found just the opposite. I got my usual shoe size, and they are very tight with my wool socks. I love the style, and I think they would be comfortable, if they weren't so tight. If I can wear these without socks or with thin socks, I may also get the same shoe in a larger size to wear with wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Magillil

customer_reviews.title: Keen Kaci winter waterproof shoes, women's style
customer_reviews.text: They feel a little stiff when putting them on for the first time, and there isn't much padding for shock absorbing, They will probably stretch in time. Although the fit is adequate, there is very little in the way of arch support. I do like the waterproof features. I also like that they have a lug style sole, makes for better traction on slippery surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Wells

customer_reviews.title: Winter shoes
customer_reviews.text: I believe these to be a great winter shoes (Kaci winter). Keens have that great boxy toe for extra room (socks). They have traction for those icy days, and lined for extra warmth. I think I’m going to like these shoes. I wear a size 6 shoe, that is what I bought. They fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Iwork4docs

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Keens always fit my foot perfectly. These are comfortable right out of the box! I took them to the beach and got rained on heavily and my feet were warm and dry, and they got covered in sand and afterward they wiped clean with no blemishes! Amazing 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Ordered my usual Keen size. FIt is perfect with thick socks. Nice and warm for the winter. Would be too loose with thin socks. Arch is only so-so, but still okay. Walked 2 miles on city streets without any problem!
customer_reviews.author: nurse in boston

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The Keen shoes are adorable and very comfortable. I bought them in red and love the color. My feet stay warm in them and my toes have wiggle room. The reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is that they are not quite comfortable and supportive enough for me to wear for serious walking (walking, not hiking). They are fine for normal walking and for the workday, but I still want to change into sneakers for a long walk. Also, I said "Fit as expected" but they are on the roomy side. That is probably why I don't find them supportive enough to wear on long walks. But for kicking around, normal walking, etc, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: LKW

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to these for the support I have come to love in Keen . This shoe however even with winter wool socks was slipping off because it was too wide. I am trying another size and style and am praying it works.
customer_reviews.author: E. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful waterproof shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Enough room in toe area to not hurt my arthritis. Waterproofing is amazing. I was standing in puddles, that didn't go over top of the shoe, and my feet were warm and dry! That was a good thing because I had to wear them on several cold rainy days and they did the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a brown pair of slip on shoes that would look nice with jeans for a decent price and these shoes are exactly what I was looking for. I normally wear a size 8 in most shoes and these shoes were a tad bit loose but overly big. I have narrow feet and the width of the toes were a little wider than I was expecting though. The color is exactly as I have pictured. (Dark chocolate brown). Happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B

customer_reviews.title: Deep enough for an additional insert.
customer_reviews.text: I needed these to fit a Superfeet rigid insert and to match the height of my orthopedic boot. I chose Keen since my Keen hiking boots are so comfortable and I was hoping these would too. These fit perfect. Can’t wait to wear the left shoe so my shoes will match!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support and perfect for winter. Fit perfectly. Looks great. There is just no cushioning. When you struggle with plantar fasciitis your need support and cushioning. Sadly these only meet one of those requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, but jumbo
customer_reviews.text: I kerp buying this shoe bc it's really comfortable and I love the red, in spite of size weirdness. Keens feel great in me, so I've been committed. First bought 8.5, generally my size, too big, but I tried to make them work with a thicker sock; they stretched to WAY too big. Now I'm in an 8 which is still a bit roomy, but I'm OK with it. Definitely a winter shoe based on fuzzy lining and need for heavy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lynch

customer_reviews.title: I love Keen shoes but this one was tight on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shoe for winder wearing. I love Keen shoes but this one was tight on the top. If you have a very high instep (arch), as I do, this shoe just didn't work. It was also very hard for me to get on. Sadly I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: My feet run between 7.5 / 8 - by comparison, I'm a Merrell 8 - and for these I feel I should have ordered a 7.5. Comfortable though, and they appear to have good tread. Very excited to have these for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Significantly larger than other Keens
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of Keen shoes and love them. However, these are significantly larger than my other Keens. I wish I had heeded the advice of other reviewers and bought a half size down from my regular size, but alas. The half size down is no longer available, so I'm returning these and am out of luck. :( I loved the shoes otherwise, but am giving just 2 stars because Keen needs to do a better job with sizing to avoid having this happen to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: - very comfortable - I will be getting more Keens - I have foot problems and bought Mephisto shoes that went to the donation bin because they were uncomfortable- pleased !
customer_reviews.author: norma m anderton

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size...buy a half size smaller....
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen shoes but this shoe runs very large so I would buy a half size smaller. Unfortunately the ankle also felt large so my ankle didn't feel very secure or supportive...I even tried putting inserts and it still felt big ...ended up giving them to friend with a bigger foot.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Love my KEENs!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say, since I already own a pair of these same shoes in a different color, but they are great! Warm and comfortable, I get compliments on my light brown ones all of the time, so I am sure the same will be true of these.
customer_reviews.author: Wrennen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, true to size for me the toe area is supposed to be roomy and there nice and comfy snug not big snug. Flexible too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking in my job and these shoes are terrific. They have a lot of room in the toe area which keeps my foot from cramping up by the end of the day. I just love them!
customer_reviews.author: RRORR

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes I've come across in a long time. Very comfortable. Ordered 6 1/2, my usual shoe size, and they are perfect! Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Support could be a little better, but that's not the type of shoe they are. Warm. not slippery. Stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bjerklien

customer_reviews.title: They hold up in Chicago winters!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping Amazon for years, and this is my first review. Winters in Chicago are no fun, and I've been searching for something in between my Birks and Uggs to wear that goes well with jeans, and can hold up to the elements as well. Decided to give these a try & LOVE them! Very well made with great traction. The top of the shoe was the slightest bit narrow when I first tried them on, but they felt extremely comfortable by the second wear. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A.

customer_reviews.title: Love wide toe box but not wide heel :(
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was all that I had hoped for! Looked great with jeans and I am sure I could have hiked in them as well. I have flat feet and plantar fasciitis and this shoe fit like a glove EXCEPT for that darn heel. It slipped something awful, so much so I couldn't overlook it and I couldn't bare the thought of wool socks with these shoes. If only.....
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: I usually order wide. These fit well and are quite comfortable. I do not wear them with socks as they would then be a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Keens
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit tight to put on, but once on, they fit as expected. I put in orthotics and they still fit fine. These do not make my feet hot. They are great casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ripstones

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but not the same.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected for size. For support, not so much. Anatomical foot bed is quite flat, so if you’re looking for that old KEEN feel, this is not the shoe for that. I have several older pairs of KEENS and they all feel better for support.
customer_reviews.author: Masked mom

customer_reviews.title: I really like them!
customer_reviews.text: My feet are hard to keep happy and I can wear these around my house almost all day, or out on shopping and errands. Only disappointment was that they weren't comfortable for a brisk walk in town. So, not walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Denise J.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfy and warm. I wear them with heavy socks. The heel slips a bit, but to be expected with a slip on shoe. I LOVE these shoes. I have a Morton's Neuroma and find that Keens are the only shoe I can wear comfortably. Kudos to Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable and look nice too
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Keen shoes and they've gotten me through the entire winter! I wear them daily walking, shopping etc. They are comfortable and look nice too. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbound

customer_reviews.title: Short and wide
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to wear these on a trip to Dublin in winter--lots of walking, lots of rain. Sadly, they were too short, from heel to toe, and too wide across the middle of the foot. Fairly plain but cute enough for travel, if they had fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, outstanding comfort, easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife, who is not allowed to bend for six months while recovering from back surgery. She slipped them and pronounced them perfect, and they are now her go-to shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Augeydoggy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They have a wide toe bed which I need for my bunions! Very comfortable and great looking too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Mortenson

customer_reviews.title: just barefoot and they fit like slippers. love the color
customer_reviews.text: I followed others reviews and ordered a half size smaller. I usually wear an 8.5 and ordered an 8. I have not tried them with socks yet, just barefoot and they fit like slippers. love the color.
customer_reviews.author: mbird

customer_reviews.title: Rest is comfortable. I debated on sending back or hoping they ...
customer_reviews.text: Around your angle is tight and top of foot by angle is tight. Rest is comfortable. I debated on sending back or hoping they would loosen up. I did the later.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, for me. They fit like a glove! I like the style and they will be great for winter I suspect. I have wide feat and a high arch which are accommodated.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Polinder

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as pictures but fits well.
customer_reviews.text: These fit well but I not pleased with the quality of the leather. This does not look like it’s picture and is not a smooth leather like the last Keens snow shoes I had. It looks like (faux) suede to me but I need this type of footwear now so I will keep them.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Pick

customer_reviews.title: Winners!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable like my other Keens. A bit more rugged for winter use (tread) but probably not for deep snow or rain puddles. As a slip-on fan, they are slightly challenging to get my feet into, but they’re so comfortable once they’re in!
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice "winter" shoes. Good tread so I don't slip on snow/ice. Got these to replace regular sneakers in the colder temps. I can also wear them for casual dining, since they're a bit more "dressy" than sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: L. King

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of foot problems and pain. Usually takes a long time to break shoes in but these are wonderful. I walked three miles in them the first time I wore them. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: WILY1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Omg I ordered another par that I couldn’t get on so I returned them. Omg this pair perfect on the first try
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The shoe I received does not look like this at all
customer_reviews.text: The shoe I received does not look like this at all. My shoe has pretty much an open back end and it is not lined with the fleece lining as shown in the picture. Certainly did not receive anything close to this picture. ????
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Heldstab

customer_reviews.title: I like them, however
customer_reviews.text: I like them, however, even though I ordered a size smaller than my last Keens, they are still a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L. Daly

customer_reviews.title: These are not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I must admit. It is a fine looking shoe. Veryet Well constructed. Unfortunately I had to return but I would consider buying them again a 1/2 size smaller!
customer_reviews.author: margaret morales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! So comfortable right out of the box. This is my second pair-last pair wasn’t waterproof-so glad these are. I live off the beaten path and wear these all winter-highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great run around shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love Keen shoes!!!!! These run just a little large, but I just wear my thicker socks! The color is great and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are roomy for wearing wool socks and cold proof for long walks to work. I am okay with the way they have stretched a little with 1 month of wear. They are designed large toe box which is comfortable for my foot.
customer_reviews.author: MM_Denver

customer_reviews.title: great winter shoe
customer_reviews.text: a great shoe for winter wear. they are warm and good on snowy or icy surfaces. I was looking for a winter shoe to wear instead of boots since I only really need boots in deeper snow. these are perfect, just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: "T"

customer_reviews.title: Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for these Keens for 2 years to replace the ones I had been wearing for 8 years. These exceed my expectations. I am very particular about the shoes I wear and these are simply amazing. I am so happy thank you seller!
customer_reviews.author: V.W.

customer_reviews.title: I started wearing them the day they came.
customer_reviews.text: The heal sometimes folds down when I put them on. Otherwise they fit and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: deedee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was comfortable from the beginning. A perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit perfectly and did not need to be broken in. Absolutely waterproof. While they don't look "delicate," they aren't clunky. Great travel shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Keen comes through!
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience with Keen, this shoe met all my expectations, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Joy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great winter shoes. Warm, waterproof and GREAT traction. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: MzVic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for when you have to be on your feet ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. Perfect for when you have to be on your feet for extended periods
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these to replace my loved but well worn Keen Baileys which are no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace my loved but well worn Keen Baileys which are no longer available. I am more than pleased with this style and the immediate comfort. Perfect for my fit and needs.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Winter shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn these shoes yet because it is still too warm outside. They fit pretty well and I am looking forward to dry, warm feet this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Measure foot from heal to toe to get a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were are comfortable immediately, no "break in period" required. Very comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Other wise a great slip on
customer_reviews.text: too big, sending them back. Other wise a great slip on.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend highly!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen shoes. They are so consistent. They are very well built. Would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Too Clunky
customer_reviews.text: I like KEEN shoes and am accustomed to the look, but this one was a little too clunky for me. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really fell in love with this shoe! I like the extra warm lining in the heal area. Very cozy and warm shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha McClure

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Keens always fit me the same, and I appreciate that predictability and quality. Nice looking shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ryder919

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow of an opening could not even get my foot into the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks & fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect - ordered 1/2 size larger to accommodate boot socks. Keeps feet warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keens
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have bought these sooner. Threw my other shoes in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. I only ordered one pair but I got two pair that’s why I had to send a pair back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Christine chalmers

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I went a half size down as suggested, & they fit perfectly! (I have duck feet - narrow heels, wide toes) Stood in line in pouring rain & they kept my feet dry & warm.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen shoes. They look good and fit great. My feet stay nice and powder fresh all day.
customer_reviews.author: Mopic Sun

customer_reviews.title: Keen doesn't disappoint. These are well made
customer_reviews.text: As always, Keen doesn't disappoint. These are well made, sturdy shoes - perfect for winter.
customer_reviews.author: SWM

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but need to size down half a size.
customer_reviews.text: Sized down half a size for a perfect fit! Thankful that there were so many reviews with this great advice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. Liked them so much i bought them ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Liked them so much i bought them for my sister. She loves them. Shes prone to going barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! This is my second pair. So comfortable I can wear them without any foot pain without needing to break them in... best shoe ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I got my shoes a1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that I got my shoes a1/2 size bigger.They run a little small. No arch support,but love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe except that it fits better with thick ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe except that it fits better with thick socks. This is my size but larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Uybungco AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice winter slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: warm and comfortable right out of the box! can't wear socks that are too thick, as it makes it a bit difficult to pull shoe on, but i think that this will be a great winter shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that said these shoes fit somewhat large. I am normally a 6, but got the 5.5. I LOVE these shoes. They are super comfy and look great. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McGee

customer_reviews.title: Not what my daughter expected did not feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the fact that the back of shoe has been a disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Sally A. Petrina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem to be pretty good, they are wide enough so very comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jansma

customer_reviews.title: The all weather shoe I've been looking for in red!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe it's comfortable all day. Weather proof for our rain and mud. Perfect red color I'm wearing them with everything.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes I've worn in long time
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I've worn in long time. Nice toe box size doesn't pinch toes and insole fits my feet very well.
